## Source: ossf-package-analysis (db0ee25cfff1ec99d94cc0e5866df17eda725c53a92c98ce3057df8f5f23c9cc)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'sendbird-notifications-extension-example' @ 1019.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
